Flow.description: Using outcome star template dependant picklist
Flow.label: Outcomes Star Reading

fields.name: Exisitng_No_Selection_Text
fields.fieldText:
No Existing Session Selected


Existing Session was selected but no Session was selected. Please return to the previous screen and select a session to attach the Outcome Star to.

fields.name: No_Outcome_Star_Text
fields.fieldText:
No Outcome Star Template


There is no Outcome Star Template associated with the program for this case.

If this is incorrect please put in a Freshservice ticket with the Star that should be available and the Program.

fields.name: OutcomeAreaText1to5
fields.fieldText:
Outcome Area


{!LoopOverOutcomeAreaTemplates.Name}


From the picklist below, select the relevant score from the Star reading and enter any notes if made during the discussion in the Star Notes box below.

fields.name: Score1to5
fields.fieldText: Score (1 to 5)

fields.name: NotesText1to5
fields.fieldText: Star Notes

fields.name: OutcomeAreaText1to10
fields.fieldText:
Outcome Area


{!LoopOverOutcomeAreaTemplates.Name}


From the picklist below, select the relevant score from the Star reading and enter any notes if made during the discussion in the Star Notes box below

fields.name: Score1to10
fields.fieldText: Score (1 - 10)

fields.name: NotesText1to10
fields.fieldText: Star Notes

fields.name: OutcomesStarReadingHeader
fields.fieldText:
Outcomes Star Reading


Ensure you enter the correct date for when the Star Chart was completed. NOT necessarily the date when you are entering the data, although it may be the same date.


As the Star tracks a Participant's journey over time, this date is important.


The next step is to tell the system how the Star was completed (Participant & Worker, Worker, Participant) and what type of Star on their journey of change is being recorded.

fields.name: Date_Completed
fields.fieldText: Date of completion

fields.name: Completed_By
fields.fieldText: Completed By

fields.name: Type
fields.fieldText: Type

fields.name: OutcomesStarReadingStarSelectionText
fields.fieldText:
Choosing the Star


Select the Star appropriate to your Program.

fields.name: OutcomesStarReadingCaptureMethodText
fields.fieldText:
Method to record the Star reading


If you have already completed a Star on paper with a Participant, and just want to enter the data, choose the first option. Likewise if you have a retrospective Star or any Star completed previously.


If you are sitting with a Participant and want to complete a Star with them in real-time, on-screen, choose the second option.

fields.name: EntryMethod
fields.fieldText: Data Capture Method

fields.name: LinkToExistingPlanText
fields.fieldText:
Link to Existing Case Plan (Optional)

If you would like to link this Outcome Star Reading to an existing Case Plan, please select one from the below.

fields.name: Existing_Case_Plan
fields.fieldText: Existing Case Plan

fields.name: ParticipantEntryScreenText
fields.fieldText:
The {!GetOutcomeStarReading.Outcome_Star_Template__r.Name} Reading is now ready for you and/or the Participant to complete.


Please click the link below to work on the Star together, or hand your device over to the Participant to complete. When finished, you will be prompted to close the Star Reading browser. Return to this screen and click Finish to complete the Outcomes Star reading.

fields.name: EntryScreenUrlText
fields.fieldText: {!ParticipantEntryScreenUrl}

fields.name: New_or_Existing_Session
fields.fieldText: Will this Outcome Star be attached to a new or existing session?

fields.name: Select_an_existing_Session
fields.fieldText: Select an existing Session:

fields.name: UnknownRecordIdTypeText
fields.fieldText:
ERROR


Please launch this flow from a Case or a Session related to a Case
